mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VISIT_LOG (visit_id, IP_ADDRESS, USER_AGENT_BROWSER , USER_AGENT_WINDOWS , REFERER, ACCESS_TIME) VALUES (VISIT_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ipAddress}, #{userAgentBrowser}, #{userAgentWindows}, #{referer}, #{accessTime} )
mapper.select: select * from CATEGORY_MENU ORDER BY category_Id
select user_agent_browser, count(*) visit_count from VISIT_LOG group by user_agent_browser
SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(access_time), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS visitdate, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM visit_log GROUP BY TRUNC(access_time) ORDER BY visitdate
SELECT EXTRACT(HOUR FROM access_time) AS visithour, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM visit_log GROUP BY EXTRACT(HOUR FROM access_time) ORDER BY visithour
